meanings.definition: Cioppinos: a type of seafood stew
meanings.sent1: At the restaurant, they serve delicious cioppinos with a variety of seafood.
meanings.sent2: My mom makes the best cioppinos for special family dinners.
meanings.sent3: The chef accidentally spilled a pot of cioppinos on his foot, making everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The aroma of the simmering cioppinos filled the kitchen, enticing everyone to come closer.
meanings.sent5: The colorful cioppinos bubbling in the pot looked like a work of art.

meanings.sent1: The menu listed various seafood dishes, including cioppinos.
meanings.sent2: We ordered two cioppinos for our table of four hungry friends.
meanings.sent3: The waiter brought out a tray of cioppinos, causing everyone to cheer.
meanings.sent4: The cioppinos on the table were a sight to behold, tempting us with their savory scent.
meanings.sent5: The group shared the cioppinos, savoring each flavorful bite.
